Articles.Content: Losing my internet connection so go ahead and just delete all posts and pictures, everything. I won't be coming back. I want to be completely removed, like I was never here.

I don't think the moderators go trough all your posts and delete them.

Edit: Why do you want everything removed in the first place?
Isn't this a little over the top? As you can just leave a goodbye post to say that you're never coming back?
Don't you worry about. I want it all gone. I'm getting rid of all I can on the internet. If I could snap my fingers and make my entire presence online disappear, I would.

I don't think the moderators go trough all your posts and delete them.

Edit: Why do you want everything removed in the first place?

Nah, but we have something that can delete all of a users posts when their account is removed.

However, we won't. Account deletion is unnecessary, and making a thread requesting it is moreso.

If you wish to remove yourself from the forums, simply stop posting and all will be well. We have lots of accounts that haven't posted in ages and haven't been deleted.

If this is a huge issue, however, please feel free to contact a site administrator, such as Ted, who can assist you.

Edited June 3, 2013 by Aphox
added link to Ted
